SELECT iibs.id as id, iibs.agreement_code as internshipType, iibs.approach as approach, iibs.internship_type as internshipType, iibs.status as status, iibs.reason as reason, iibs.dispositon as dispositon, iibs.company_name as companyName, iibs.social_code as socialCode, iibs.principal as principal, iibs.company_scale as companyScale, iibs.company_telephone as companyTelephone, iibs.company_mail as companyMail, iibs.company_post as companyPost, iibs.company_nature as companyNature, iibs.company_industry as companyIndustry, iibs.company_area as companyArea, iibs.company_address as companyAddress, iibs.company_code as companyCode, iibs.job_name as jobName, iibs.job_department as jobDepartment, iibs.job_content as jobContent, iibs.company_teacher as companyTeacher , iibs.company_teacher_telephone as companyTeacherTelephone, iibs.job_category as jobCategory, iibs.job_type as jobType, iibs.job_brief_info as jobBriefInfo, iibs.job_area as jobArea, iibs.job_code as jobCode, iibs.job_address as jobAddress, iibs.start_time as startTime, iibs.end_time as endTime, iibs.approach as approach, iibs.is_aboral as isAboral, iibs.salary as salary, iibs.is_special as isSpecial, iibs.extra as extra, iibs.file_url as fileUrl,
si.student_name as name, uu.user_avatar as userAvatar,
ti.teacher_name as name, u.user_avatar as userAvatar,
iibs.create_time as time,
iibs.update_time as time,
iibs.agreement_code as agreementCode, iibs.fail_reason as failReason, iibs.deleted as deleted FROM internship_info_by_student iibs LEFT JOIN teacher_info ti ON iibs.update_by = ti.user_id and ti.deleted=0 LEFT JOIN student_info si ON iibs.create_by = si.user_id and si.deleted=0 LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.id = ti.user_id and u.deleted=0 LEFT JOIN `user` uu ON uu.id = si.user_id and uu.deleted=0
iibs.deleted = 0
AND iibs.id = #{internshipId}
